body_html: @21011996 , is there any trick to uninstall cuda 9.1 and reinstall cuda 9.0 ? I went in the uninstaller control pannel window on windows 10 to uninstall all cuda 9.1 components. but now the cuda 9.0 installation keep failing even after reboot.

body: @21011996 , is there any trick to uninstall cuda 9.1 and reinstall cuda 9.0 ? I went in the uninstaller control pannel window on windows 10 to uninstall all cuda 9.1 components. but now the cuda 9.0 installation keep failing even after reboot.
